name: Holiday Inn Express Warren

reviews.text: Spotless rooms, well lit, nice linens, very comfortable.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

likes.liked: — They do offer discounted rates for area companies, so it's worth calling the hotel direct to ask before you book.

reviews.text: The high speed internet access works without a problem, too.
reviews.title: Friendly Staff..would recommend.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Warren Hotel Warren
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Detroit/Warren. Recently renovated to satisfy your travel needs, our 124 guest rooms and 21 Jacuzzi rooms feature a fresh new look, luxurious beds, a much larger work space and much improved lighting. Start your day with our complimentary, hot buffet breakfast and relax in the evening with friends or co-workers in our Great Room, which features a fireplace and a big, flat screen TV. Enjoy a full complimentary dinner Monday-Wednesday. We have a 24 hour business center with high-speed Internet access, a FAX, printer and plenty of work space. We are conveniently located close to General Motors, DaimlerChrysler, Tacom, General Dynamics, and we are the only hotel called the Holiday Inn Express GM Tech Center.
